messages.zh: ......刚才我们清理掉的，不是唯一的敌人。
messages.tl: ...the one we cleaned up just now is not the only enemy.

messages.zh: 她......她和其他那些Reunion Movement......不太一样......
messages.tl: She... she is not the same as the other Reunion Movement...

messages.zh: 糟糕......他们的数量和刚才相比多上太多了！
messages.tl: Oops...the number of them is much more than just now!

messages.zh: 狙击小队，我们该瞄准她的落脚点！
messages.tl: Sniper squad, we should aim at her foothold!
not good! The Reunion Movement is hidden behind!
- is an ambush! Don't be exposed to the bunker!

messages.zh: 另一批伏兵开始攻击了！
messages.tl: Another batch of ambush began to attack!

messages.zh: 难道Reunion Movement早就暗中军事化了？
messages.tl: Has the Reunion Movement been secretly militarized?
The whole team, full effort to break through! !
